reasoning: ALK-positive large B-cell lymphoma (ALK+ DLBCL) is an extremely rare lymphoma subtype. Estimated incidence ~0.08 per 100k based on rarity among DLBCL cases (<5 cases per 100 DLBCL). Low confidence due to limited epidemiological data.
source: WHO Classification of Lymphoid Neoplasms; case series and registry data
